ideas.title: Create an App to jot down ideas
ideas.author: Jochem

ideas.title: Create a website to jot down ideas
ideas.description: Let's make an application that allows you to store your idea in the most easiest way possible. And that will display's a random idea each time you visit the page again
ideas.author: Jochem

ideas.title: Create a Wall board that shows ideas randomly
ideas.description: The next idea is to create a wallboard in the office, showing the idea's that are entered in the app.
ideas.author: Jochem

ideas.title: Up and Downvote Icons
ideas.description: The idea can be upvoted and downvotes using arrows or a swipe.
ideas.author: Jochem
